statement.p: Consider the note E4 which has frequency 329.628 Hz.
What is the period for E4?
What is the wavelength for E4?
Recall that the speed of sound is 1116 feet per second.

solution.p: Period is the inverse of frequency, so \displaystyle\frac{{1}}{{329.628}}\approx{0.003033722863349}\approx{0.00303372}.
Wavelength is a unit conversion: \displaystyle\frac{{{1116}\ \text{ ft}}}{{\text{second}}}\cdot\frac{{{1}\ \text{ second}}}{{{329.628}\ \text{ cycles}}}\approx{3.3856347154975}\approx{3.386}.
